commandobject.name: Pause
commandobject.documentation: Will pause/unpause the game. The game can be paused just if bAllowPause = true in GameBots2004.ini (different settings for bots and server possible).

property.name: PauseBots

property.name: PauseAll
property.documentation: Everyone in the game will be paused if set to true. To unpause send PAUSE command with PauseAll set to false.
